item.title: SharePoint Server Subscription Edition - First Review
item.description: New SharePoint OnPremise Version Four days ago a new SharePoint OnPremise version is released for preview. It is called SharePoint Server Subscription Edition and comes with some promising headlines: Today weâ€™re excited to open the window to our vision, strategy, and future for SharePoint and provide a first look at the most recent developments with SharePoint Server. We designed SharePoint Server SE around the core principles of: Always up to date, Secure and reliable, Designed for you
